languages.text: {n}Соломон галантно кивает в ответ.{/n} "Стремлюсь к совершенству во всем".
{n}Solomorne gives a debonair nod in response.{/n} "I strive for perfection in all things."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne bestätigt deine Worte mit einem freundlichen Nicken.{/n} "Ich strebe in allem, was ich tue, nach Perfektion."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a debonair nod in response.{/n} "I strive for perfection in all things."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne bestätigt deine Worte mit einem freundlichen Nicken.{/n} "Ich strebe in allem, was ich tue, nach Perfektion."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous adresse un hochement de tête débonnaire.{/n} « Je vise toujours la perfection. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a debonair nod in response.{/n} "I strive for perfection in all things."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous adresse un hochement de tête débonnaire.{/n} « Je vise toujours la perfection. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは余裕の笑みを浮かべてうなずいた。{/n}「私はあらゆることにおいて完璧を目指しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a debonair nod in response.{/n} "I strive for perfection in all things."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは余裕の笑みを浮かべてうなずいた。{/n}「私はあらゆることにおいて完璧を目指しています」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne responde asintiendo con gallardía.{/n} «Me esfuerzo por alcanzar la perfección en todo lo que hago».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a debonair nod in response.{/n} "I strive for perfection in all things."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne responde asintiendo con gallardía.{/n} «Me esfuerzo por alcanzar la perfección en todo lo que hago».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙温和地点点头，回应着你。{/n}“我凡事力求完美。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a debonair nod in response.{/n} "I strive for perfection in all things."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙温和地点点头，回应着你。{/n}“我凡事力求完美。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, başını zarifçe sallıyor.{/n} "Yaptığım her şeyde mükemmeli hedeflerim."
